articles.title: Greg Norman: ‘I don't reflect on losing the '96 Masters – you move on’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Twenty-five years after his final-round capitulation handed the Green Jacket to Nick Faldo, the Australian prefers to focus on his role in Dustin Johnson’s 2020 Augusta win, he tells Ewan Murray
